trans:
Everyone knows that LingOrm tickets are extremely rare. I bought them from a reseller at a very high price. My parents came to Nanning to watch LingOrm with me, and the total cost for 6 tickets was around 34,000 yuan (approximately 161,700 baht, or about 26,950 baht each). Additionally, I supported LingOrm's fans by sending them tickets and more worth nearly 10,000 yuan (47,600 baht).
My parents and my 7 other relatives had planned to visit Hong Kong and Macau for a month. However, because of the Nanning trip, they adjusted the plan to join my parents at Nanning. I had told them in my 20s that I wouldn't get married or have a child, and they have respected my freedom.
My parents are aware that LingOrm starred in GL, and they are also familiar with The Secret of Us, having seen the kissing scenes. Although they're not shippers of the pairing, they like both Ling and Orm. They think Ling and Orm are polite, well-mannered, and adorable. They think Ling is very attractive and Orm is incredibly cheerful.
Thank you for your interest and kind compliments! LingOrm Forever. üåπ‚Äú
